item.title: This Is How To Do Deals!
item.description: Sharing tips and strategies for successfully negotiating and closing deals, this video highlights effective approaches and practical advice.

media:content.media:title: This Is How To Do Deals!
media:content.media:description: Sharing tips and strategies for successfully negotiating and closing deals, this video highlights effective approaches and practical advice.

item.title: Rabbit Used To Buy A Lot Of Repossesions!
item.description: Exploring how Rabbit frequently purchased repossessed items, this video shares the stories, finds, and insights from these unique acquisitions.

item.title: They Had to be Ready to GO!
item.description: Highlighting a situation where quick action was essential, this video explores the preparation, urgency, and challenges involved in being ready to respond.

item.title: We are all going down
item.description: Documenting a thrilling or challenging experience, this video captures the tension, teamwork, and excitement as everyone faces a high-stakes moment together.

item.title: Restoring a Classic Saleen: Back to Original Glory!
item.description: A first look at the restoration of a legendary Saleen, bringing a rare classic back to its original beauty, one careful detail at a time.

item.title: Fueling Up, 1950s Style
item.description: A nostalgic look back at how filling up your tank used to be, when service, simplicity, and style defined every stop at the station.

item.title: Get To Work, Don't Wait For The Right Time!
item.description: A motivating message about taking action instead of waiting for the “perfect” moment, because success comes to those who start, not those who hesitate.

item.title: 96 Corvette, Six Speed!
item.description: 96 Corvette, Six Speed!

item.title: Turning Dime Piece into Big Bucks
item.description: A quick story about transforming a standout car, the “dime piece”, into real profit through smart moves and sharp instincts.

item.title: This License Plate Got Me In BIG Trouble
item.description: A fun story about choosing the perfect personalized plate, and how finding the right mix of clever and classy can be trickier than it seems.

item.title: Something's Off About This Truck Sale
item.description: A story about a deal that didn’t feel quite right, and how trusting your instincts can make all the difference in the car business.

item.title: A 92 Chevrolet Is All You Need!
item.description: A tribute to the reliability and charm of the 1992 Chevrolet, proof that sometimes all you need is a classic that never quits.

item.title: The Art of the Perfect Car Pitch
item.description: A look at what makes a great salesman: blending confidence, knowledge, and storytelling to turn every “show and tell” into a deal.

item.title: Scammed in Broad Daylight
item.description: A cautionary story about a car pickup that took a wrong turn, and how one small oversight can lead to a costly lesson in trust and awareness.

item.title: I Used To Buy More Than 1 Car A Year
item.description: A look back at the days of buying cars nonstop, when passion for finding the next great ride always won over patience or practicality.

item.title: This Truck Was Museum Quality!
item.description: A story about a one-of-a-kind truck restored to perfection, the kind of vehicle that looks just as at home in a showroom as it would in a museum.

item.title: New Plans: Will You Sink or Swim?
item.description: A look behind the meaning of the “Rabbit’s Used Cars” logo, and how it represents resilience, growth, and the drive to keep moving forward.

item.title: They Gave Me a Camaro for $2500
item.description: A quick story about landing a classic Camaro for just $2,500, proof that sometimes the best finds come when you least expect them.

item.title: Why Customer Service Still Rules in Car Sales?
item.description: A reminder that great customer service never goes out of style. It’s still the key to earning trust, closing deals, and building lasting relationships.

item.title: You Sold That Truck? I Wanted It!
item.description: A story about the kind of vehicle that turns heads, and how letting it go sparked more reactions than expected.
